You must have at least one member object: You must have at least one member object tied to your account to access someone else's guild as an admin. The code demands there must always be a member object!

Hello! My name is Lemmings19 and I am th: Hello! My name is Lemmings19 and I am the author of this That's My BIS. I've spent hundreds upon hundreds of hours building, maintaining, and supporting TMB and its community.
Everything you donate will go back into: Everything you donate will go back into development, and not to some CEO's yacht...
If you want to reach out to me directly,: If you want to reach out to me directly, find me on the That's My BIS Discord. My username is Lemmings19#1149. Sometimes, I'm even on YouTube.
None of this would be here without the g: None of this would be here without the generous donors listed below, and the kind folks who have helped contribute their time.
May you get all of your BIS!: May you get all of your BIS!

The current Discord server will be open: Po zrobieniu tego, aktualny serwer Discorda będzie otwarty dla rejestracji gildii.
Only one guild per expansion can be regi: Tylko jedna gildia per dodatek/rozszerzenie może być zarejestrowana do serwera Discord.

But you'll probably be the one to take i: Ale prawdopodobnie Ty będziesz osobą, która go zajmie, więc to *prawdopodobnie* jest ok.
If you came here hoping to ditch some te: Jeśli przybyłeś tu w poszukiwaniu danych do testowania to dobrze trafiłeś!
Just choose a junk Discord server, then: Wybierz jakiś tymczasowy serwer Discorda a  potem zarejestruj gildię na poprawnym serwerze.
You'll be back to square one with an emp: Wrócisz do stanu początkowego z pustą gildią.

Import wishlist and loot priority data i: Import wishlist and loot priority data into the Gargul addon. Select all ( ctrl+a ), copy ( ctrl+c ) and then paste ( ctrl+v ) in the import window (/gl wl). For more info check :curseforge_url on Curseforge. Happy lootin'!
This applies across your entire guild. I: This applies across your entire guild. If you\'re the one running the export for the first time, expect fresh data. If your guildmate just ran an export, you will have to wait :count minutes for the data to update. Officers may get a different cache than members depending on wishlist/prio visibility.
Publicly sharable copy of the generic lo: Publicly sharable copy of the generic loot tables here. The format of the data being exported is subject to change. If you need access to data that isn\'t here, please reach out on Discord.

Why use different spaces for each expans: Po co używać różnych przestrzeni dla osobnych dodatków?
Each expansion has different classes, pr: Każdy dodatek ma inne klasy, profesje, dungeony i tabele z lootem. Pogmatwanym byłoby mieszanie tego wszystkiego.
Will my guild lose its current setup?: Czy moja gildia straci obecne ustawienia?
